ScriptItemPortable.SourceCode:
def Load(widget): import clr clr.AddReference("Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes") from Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes.Contratos import CNContratoObjeto from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import FieldDefinition registro = widget.Entity if registro == None: return
contratoEmElaboracao = CNContratoObjeto.ContratoEmElaboracao(long(registro.Fields["CONTRATO"].Handle.Value))
if widget.View.Commands["New"] <> None: widget.View.Commands["New"].Visible = contratoEmElaboracao if widget.View.Commands["Edit"] <> None: widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = contratoEmElaboracao if widget.View.Commands["Delete"] <> None: widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = contratoEmElaboracao

def OnRATEIOExecute(command, entity): import clr clr.AddReference("Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes") from Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes.Financeiro import FNLancamentoCodigoInterno
command.OutputDefinition.Parameters["CODIGOINTERNO"] = FNLancamentoCodigoInterno.ciCOO command.OutputDefinition.Parameters["ENTIDADEORIGEM"] = entity command.OutputDefinition.Parameters["SOMENTELEITURA"] = False
